# The first (n / (a + b)) = 8 / 7 = 1 times of a + b balls = 7 balls will be repeated

from fractions import gcd

def main():
    n, a, b = map(int, input().split())
    d = gcd(a, b)
    n -= 1
    a //= d
    b //= d
    n %= (a + b)

    if n < a:
        print(n + 1)
    else:
        print(a - (n - a) - 1)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
